description: Code or name identifying the kind of usage meter tracked for assets (e.g., time-based or distance-based).
Human-readable label or description of the meter type for use in screens and reports.
Likely indicates the value category or format produced by this meter (e.g., numeric count, time, distance); confirm with SME.
Username or identifier of the user or process that created this meter type record.
Timestamp when the meter type record was created.
Username or identifier of the user or process that last modified this meter type record.
Timestamp when the meter type record was last updated.
